name: quickly
description: Une biblioth√®que TypeScript avec du Rust pour la performance

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:rust && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run compile:test && node dist/test.js
scripts.bench: npm run build && npm run compile:bench && node dist/benchmark.js
scripts.test:simple: npm run build && webpack --config webpack.simple.js && cp pkg/*.wasm dist/ && node dist/simple-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run bench
